name: BreakItDown
0:
”Alexa open break it down”
”alexa tell break it down to spell deep”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: break it down
des: Break It Down is an alexa skill that spells a certain set of words. with break it down when you choose one of the words within the skills library, alexa will spell the word for you letter by letter
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
